parameters: The dragon is close, but you could try and sneak around
We will try to be quiet...
We killed it...I can't believe it.
Damn right we did! Well done everyone.
I must admit humans, your prowess in battle is
impressive. Perhaps I have underestimated you.
Lets press on, we've lost some time. I'm
worried about Castle Altair, we need to get
There is a dock near Durast Elim, but that's
beyond the Lunar and Solar shrines. There's
no reason not to keep on our current course
Unless we get strafed by another dragon...

There's no point, the bridge over the
Aetherflow has been destroyed. We'd need to go
all the way back to the Dauntless to continue,
the dragon could wake up at any time.

we try, it could be a much more difficult
Tali, you said it has weaker armour than other

I'm all ears. Let's have it.

would detonate on impact. The problem is that

Smart plan. Let's do it Elim, i'm ready to take
Elim, this is a good idea, but if you think
that we can sneak past and avoid a having a
confrontation, that's still on the table for
now as well. Think about it, and then decide.
